nodes.text: Rasmus Blys was a Special Executive and biochemist of Czerka Corporation and was in charge of CZ-198, one of Czerka's many product development facilities. Dr. Blys is well educated on the subject of biochemistry and other sciences. He later worked for Czerka Corporation. He was a brilliant biochemist and had designed multiple award-winning Czerka patents, such as the usage of DNA and cybernetics to create biological weapons. He also created the deadly bioweapon, the Vigilant.
Rasmus Blys first appeared in game update 2.3 of the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel, released by BioWare in 2013.
